title: "Attempting to Reconnect" at the start of a game
body:
I've had a bit of an issue when trying to play lately.

Every time, no matter what, I'll disconnect at the start of the game. This happens before anybody spawns at the fountain or shortly before minions spawn and so far it's happened every single time, often times taking about 10 minutes to reconnect, putting me behind in the game. Sometimes the problem repeats later in the game but this isn't always the case. This doesn't happen with any of my other games either. Interestingly enough I've noticed my download speed drops to zero at the start of every game and slowly rises back up over the course of more or less 20 minutes before stabilising. This happens in custom games, PvP matches, PvE matches and even the tutorial. I'm totally clueless as to why this happens and, outside of the basics, I'm quite technologically inept. 

Has anyone else faced a similar problem? Could someone who knows what they're talking about possibly help me? Any kind of assistance would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
It sounds like you've got a pretty unstable connection, so you're getting delays or cut off from the game at random moments.  You should run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what exactly is going on.

Should it confirm my suspension, your best bet would be to go over each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help.   Let me know if you have any questions!

Thanks for the advice!

After running through all the steps in the connection issues guide the problem seems to have been somewhat solved. I no longer lose connection constantly throughout a game. Occasionally it still happens at the very start but not long enough for it to be of any impact to the game.
